-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------[THE KING OF FIGHTERS 98']--------------------------
--------------------------------[FAQ/Movelist]---------------------------------
------------------------------[by Ice Queen Zero]------------------------------
---------------------------------[Neo Geo CD]----------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

o---------------------o
      INTRODUCTION
o---------------------o
This is the last word in the KOFs from '94 to '97. KOF '98 boasts a wealth of 
characters from past titles, making this a true dream match. It includes the 
Extra and Advanced Modes, and a basic game system that's a modified version of 
KOF '97 with improved game balance to accommodate all its fans. 

- KOF 10th Anniversary Site

o---------------------o
       DISCLAIMER
o---------------------o
King of Fighters 98' and its characters are trademarks of SNK n' all copyrights
belong to them.

This FAQ/Walkthrough is the sole copyright of Ice Queen Zero and cannot be put
on other sites or posted without given permission nor can it be reproduced w/o
proper consent.


o--------------------o
         TEAMS
o--------------------o

Esaka Team: Kyo Kusanagi, Benimaru Nikaido, Goro Daimon
Fatal Fury Team: Terry Bogard, Andy Bogard, Joe Higashi
Art of Fighting Team: Ryo Sakazaki, Robert Garcia, Yuri Sakazaki
Ikari Team: Leona Heidern, Ralf Jones, Clark Steel
Psycho Solider Team: Athena Asamiya, Sie Kensou, Chin Gentsai
Women's Team: Chizuru Kagura, Mai Shiranui, King
Kim Team: Kim Kaphawn, Chang Koehan, Choi Bounge
Orochi Team: Yashiro Nanakase, Shermie, Chris
97' Special Team: Ryuji Yamazaki, Blue Mary Ryan, Billy Kane
Yagami Team: Iori Yagami, Mature, Vice
Oyaji Team: Heidern, Saisyu Kusanagi, Takuma Sakazaki
USA Sports: Heavy D!, Lucky Glauber, Brian Battler
Edit Only: Shingo Yabuki, Rugal Bernstein
EX Characters: Orochi Yashiro, Orochi Shermie, Orochi Chris, 95' Kyo, EX Terry,
EX Andy, EX Joe, EX Ryo, EX Robert, EX Yuri, EX Mai, EX Billy, Omega Rugal


o--------------------o
        CONTROLS
o--------------------o

A button is for light punch
B button is for light kick
C button is for hard punch
D button is for hard kick

Press Start button to taunt the opponent.

Press A, B, and C buttons simultaneously when dizzy or in a hold to have a 
partner attack. However, no damage is done and the partner must be on good or
neutral terms and within the screen to work.

Press A, B, and C simultaneously in Advance Mode to power up a stock

Hold A, B, and C buttons simultaneously to charge up the POW meter in Extra.

Press A and B to roll in Advance Mode.

Press A and B buttons simultaneously to dodge in Extra Mode.

Press C and D buttons simultaneously to perform a knockdown attack.

In advance mode only, press A and B buttons simultaneously while blocking to do
a guard cancel roll (need a stock). C and D buttons while blocking does a guard
cancel knockdown attack (need a stock).

On the D-pad,

     u
  ub   uf
b         f
  db   df
     d

ub jumps backwards
u jumps straight up
uf jumps forwards
f walks forward
d crouches
db blocks low attacks and standing attacks
b blocks standing and jump attacks
~ means to hold previous direction briefly before continuing the motion

b or f + C tosses the opponent when nearby.
f,f runs forward (Advanced) or hops forward (Extra)
b,b hops backwards

********************************PROTAGANIST TEAM*******************************

Kyo Kusanagi
Fighting Style : Ancient Kusanagi-style martial arts
Birthdate : 12th December
Nationality : Japan
Blood Group : B (RH-)
Height : 181 cm
Weight : 75 kg
Likes : Writing Poetry
Fav. Food  : Barbecued fish
Strong Sports  : Ice hockey
Impt Things  : His motorcycle and girlfriend Yuki
Hated Things  : Hard work

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Hachi Tetsu: close, b or f + C
Issetsu Seoi Nage: close, b or f + D


                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Ge Shiki: Goufu You: f + D
Ge Shiki: Naraku Otoshi: in air, d + C
88 Shiki: df + D

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

114 Shiki Aragami: d, df, f + A
128 Shiki Kono Kizu: 114 Shiki Aragami, d, df, f + P
127 Shiki Yano Sabi: 114 Shiki Aragami, f, df, d, db, b + P
                     128 Kono Kizu, P
125 Shiki Nana Se: 128 Kono Kizu, K
                   127 Shiki Yano Sabi, K
Ge Shiki Migiri Ugachi: 127 Shiki Yano Sabi, P
115 Shiki Doku Kami: d, df, f + C
401 Shiki Tumi Yomi: 115 Shiki Domu Kami, f, df, d, db, b + P
402 Shiki Batu Yomi: 401 Shiki Tumi Yomi, f + P
100 Shiki Oniyaki: f, d, df + P
202 Shiki Kototsuki You: f, df, d, db, b + K
R.E.D. Kick: b, d, db + K
75 Shiki Kai: d, df, f + B, B or D, D
910 Shiki Nue Tumi: d, db, b + P
Ge Shiki Ryuu Iri: d, db, b + P (high counter)
Ge Shiki Tora Fuse: d, db, b + P (low counter)

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Ura 108 Shiki: Orochinagi: d, db, b, db, d, df, f + P
Mu Shiki: (d, df, f)x2 + P (C taunts after the move)

---

Benimaru Nikaido
Fighting Style : Japanese version of Muey Thai (Thai kickboxing)
Birthdate : 6th June
Nationality : Japan (with American heritage)
Blood Group : O+
Height : 180 cm
Weight : 68 kg
Likes : Being the center of attraction
Fav. Food  : Sashimi
Strong Sports  : Clay disc shooting
Impt Things  : Himself
Disliked Things  : Otaku, regrets

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Catch and Shoot: close, b or f + C
Front Suplex: close, b or f+ D
Spinning Knee Drop: in air and close, b or f or d + C

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Jacknife Kick: f + B
Flying Drill: in air, d + D

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Raijinen: d, df, f + P
Kuuchuu Raijinken: in air, d, df, f + P
Shinkuu Katete Koma: d, db, b + P
Super Inazuma Kick: f, d, df + K
Iai-geri: d, df, f + K
Handou Sandan Geri: f, df, d, db, b + K
Benimaru Collider: close, f, df, d, db, b, f + P

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Raikoken: (d, df, f)x2 + P
Electrigger: close, (f, df, d, db, b)x2 + P

---

Goro Daimon
Fighting Style : Judo + Self-created fighting techniques
Birthdate : 5th May
Nationality : Japan
Blood Group : A+
Height : 204 cm
Weight : 138 kg
Likes : Understanding nature
Fav. Food  : Zaru soba
Strong Sports  : Judo
Impt Things  : His wooden shoes
Hated Things  : Detailed machinery


                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Juuji Shime: close, b or f + C
Tsukami Tataki Tsuke: a step away, b or f + C
Okuri Kyaku Harai: close, b or f + D

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Takara Tsubushi: f + A
Zujo Barai: df + C

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Jiraishin: f, d, df + P (A acts, C fakes)
Chou Ukemi: d, db, b + K
Kumo Tsukami Nage: b, db, d, df, f + A
Kirikabu Gaeshi: b, db, d, df, f + C
Chou Oosotogari: close, f, d, df + K
Tenchi Gaeshi: close, f, df, d, db, b, f + P
Nekko Gaeshi: d, df, f + K
Ura Nage: close, f, df, d, db, b, f + K

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Jigoku Gokuraku Otoshi: close, (f, df, d, db, b)x2+P
Nekko Nuki: (b, db, d, df, f)x2 + K
Zoku Kiri Kabu Gaeshi: Neko Meki, b, db, d, df, f + K
Bukko Nuki Ura Nage: f, d, df + K
Zoku Tenchi Gaeshi: f, d, df + K (MAX)

********************************FATAL FURY TEAM********************************

Terry Bogard
Fighting Style : Martial arts taught by his father Jeff Bogard
Birthdate : 15th March
Nationality : America
Blood Group : O+
Height : 182 cm
Weight : 82 kg
Likes : Video games
Fav. Food  : Junk food
Strong Sports  : Basketball
Impt Things  : Gloves from his father
Hated Things  : Slugs


                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Grasping Upper: close, b or f + C
Buster Throw: close, b or f + D

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Back Knuckle: f + A
Rising Upper: df + C

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Power Wave: d, df, f + P
Burn Knuckle: d, db, b + P
Crack Shoot: d, db, b + K
Rising Tackle: f, d, df + P
Power Dunk: f, d, df + K
Power Charge: b, db, d, df, f + K

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Power Geyser: d, db, b, db, f + P
High Angle Geyser: (d, df, f)x2 + K

---

Andy Bogard
Fighting Style: Koppou (Basic knowledge of Shiranui Ninjitsu)
Birthday: 16th August
Nationality: America
Blood Type: A
Height: 172 cm
Weight: 67 kg
Fav. Food: Natto spaghetti
Best Sport: Short track
Impt Things: Photo of him and his master in his training days
Hated Things: Dogs

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Gourin Kai: close, b or f + C
Kakaekomi Nage: close, b or f + D

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Jou Agito: f + B
Age Omote: df + A

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Zaneiken:db,f + P
Gadankou: Zaneiken, d, df, f+P
Hishouken: d, db, b + P
Shouryuudan: f, d, df + P
Kuuhadan: b, db, d, df, f + K
Geki Kabehaisui Sho: close, b, db, d, df, f + P
Genei Shiranui: in air, d, df, f + P
Shimo Agito: Genei Shiranui, P
Uwa Agito: Genei Shiranui, K

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Chou Reppadan: d, db, b, db, d, df, f + K
Hisho Ryuseiken: (d, df, f)x2 + P

---

Joe Higashi
Fighting Style : Muey Thai (Thai kickboxing)
Birthdate : 29th March
Nationality : Japan
Blood Group : AB+
Height : 180 cm
Weight : 71 kg
Likes : Creating noises, brawling
Fav. Food  : Deep-fried alligator meat
Strong Sports  : All types of martial arts
Impt Things  : Hachimaki (the bandanna on his forehead)
Hated Things  : School


                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Hiza Jigoku: close, b or f + C
Leg Throw: close, b or f + D

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Low Kick: f + B
Sliding: df + B

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Hurricane Upper: b, db, d, df, f + P
Bakuretsu: P rapidly
Finish: Bakuretsu, d, df, f + P
Tiger Kick: f, d, df + K
Slash Kick: b, db, d, df, f + K
Ougon no Kakato: d, db, b + K

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Screw Upper: (d, df, f)x2 + P
Bakuretsu Hurricane Tiger Kakato: d, df, f, df, d, db, b + P

********************************KYOKUGEN TEAM**********************************

Ryo Sakazaki
Fighting Style : Kyokugen Karate
Birthdate : 2nd August
Nationality : Japan
Blood Group : O+
Height : 179 cm
Weight : 75 kg
Likes : Weekend Carpentry
Fav. Food  : Mochi (rice cakes), natto (fermented soy beans)
Strong Sports  : Sumo Wrestling
Impt Things  : His recovered motorcycle, horse
Hated Things  : Bugs with multiple legs

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Tani Otoshi: close, b or f + C
Tomoe Nage: close, b or f + D

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Hyouchuu Wari: f + A

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Ko Ou Ken: d, df, f + P
Kohou: f, d, df + P
Hien Shippu Kyaku: f, df, d, db, b + K
Kyokugen Renbuken: close, b, db, d, df, f + P
Mouko Raijingoh: d, db, b + P (can follow with Kohou)
Mouko Raijinsetsu: d, df, f + K

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Ryuuko Ranbu: d, df, f, df, d, db, b + P
Haoh Shou Ko Ken: f, b, db, d, df, f + P
Tenchi Haoh Ken: (d, df, f)x2 + P

---

Robert Garcia
Fighting Style : Kyokugen Karate
Birthdate : 25th December
Nationality : Italy
Blood Group : AB+
Height : 180 cm
Weight : 85 kg
Likes : Collecting cars
Fav. Food  : Sushi, yakisoba (japanese noodles)
Strong Sports  : Motoring sports
Impt Things  : His collection of cars
Hated Things  : Rakkyoo (garlic)


                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Ryuuchou Kyaku: close, b or f + C
Kubikiri Nage: close, b or f + D

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Ryuu Han Shuu: f + B
Kou Ryuu Gokyageri: f + A

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Ryuugeki Ken: d, df, f + P
Ryuuga: f, d, df + P
Hien Shippu Kyaku: f, df, d, db, b + K
Kyokugen Ryuuren Mai Kyaku: close, b, db, d, df, f + K
Ryuuzan Shou: f, d, df + K
Hien Ryuujin Kyaku: in air, d, db, b + K

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Ryuuko Ranbu: d, df, f, df, d, db, b + P
Haoh Shou Ko Ken: f, b, db, d, df, f + P
Muei Shippuu Juudankyaku: (d, df, f)x2 + K

---

Yuri Sakazaki
Fighting Style : Kyokugen Karate
Birthdate : 7th December
Nationality : Japan
Blood Group : A+
Height : 168 cm
Weight : 54 kg
Likes : Karaoke
Fav. Food  : Sweet curry rice
Strong Sports  : Softball
Impt Things  : Friends, Ronnet's earrings
Hated Things  : Octopus

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Oni Harite: close, b or f + C
Silent Nage: close,b or f + D
Tsubame Otoshi: in air and close, b or f or d + C

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Tsubame Tsubasa: f + B

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Ko ou Ken: d, df, f + P
Chou Upper: f, d, df + P
Double Chou Upper: Strong Chou Upper, f, d, df + P
Raiou Ken: d, df, f + K
Hien Shippu Ken: d, db, b + P
Hien Shippu Kyaku: d, db, b + K

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Hien Hou'ou Kyaku: d, df, f, df, d, db, b + K
Haoh Shou Kou Ken: f, b, db, d, df, f + P
Hien Rekkou: (d, df, f)x2 + P


********************************IKARI TEAM*************************************

Leona Heidern
Fighting Style : Martial arts + Heidern-style assasination techniques
Birthdate : 10th January
Nationality : Unknown
Blood Group : B+
Height : 176 cm
Weight : 66 kg
Likes : None
Fav. Food  : Vegetables
Strong Sports  : None
Impt Things  : None
Hated Things  : Blood


                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Leona Crush: close, b or f + C
Ordeal Buckler: close, b or f + D
Heidern Inferno: in air and close, b or f or + C

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Strike Arch: f + B

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o
Moon Slasher: d~u + P
Grand Saber: b~f + K
Gliding Buster: Strong Grand Saber: f + D
X Caliber: d~u + K
Baltic Launcher: b~f + P
I-Slasher: d, db, b + P
Earring Bakudan: d, db, b + K

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

V Slasher: d, df, f, df, d, db, b + P
Rebel Spark: d, db, b, db, d, df, f + K
Gravity Storm: (d, df, f)x2 + P

---

Ralf Jones
Fighting Style : Martial arts + Heidern-style assasination techniques
Birthdate : 25th August
Nationality : America
Blood Group : A+
Height : 188 cm
Weight : 90 kg
Likes : Collecting knives
Fav. Food  : Bubble gum
Strong Sports  : Baseball
Impt Things  : Badge of honour
Hated Things  : Snakes

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Dynamite Headbutt: close, b or f + C
Northern Lights Bomb: close, b or f + D

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Vulcan Punch: P rapidly (ABCD to cancel)
Gatling Attack: b~f + P
Kyuukouka Bakudan Punch: d~u + P or in air, d, db, b + P
Super Argentine Backbreaker: close, b, db, d, df, f + K
Ralk Kick: b~f + K

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Bari Bari Vulcan Punch: d, df, f, df, d, db, b + P
Umanori Vulcan Punch: d, df, f, df, d, db, b + K
Galactica Phantom: (d, df, f)x2 + P

---

Clark Steel
Fighting Style : Martial arts + Heidern-style assasination techniques
Birthdate : 7th May
Nationality : America
Blood Group : A+
Height : 187 cm
Weight : 89 kg
Likes : Collecting guns
Fav. Food  : Oatmeal
Strong Sports  : Wrestling
Impt Things  : His sunglasses
Hated Things  : Slugs


                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Nageppanashi German: b or f + C
Fisherman Buster: close, b or f + D
Death Lake Drive: in air and close, b or f or d + C

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Stomping: f + B

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Vulcan Punch: P repeatedly
Super Argentine Backbreaker*: close, b, db, d, df, f + K
Super Arabian Burgulary Backbreaker*: b, db, d, df, f + A
Rolling Cradle*: b, db, d, df, f + C
Napalm Stretch*: f, d, df + P
Frankensteiner*: close, f, d, df + K
Flashing Elbow: after * moves, d, df, f + P

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Ultra Argentine Backbreaker: close, (f, df, d, db, b)x2 + P
Running Three: (b, db, d, df, f)x2 + K

****************************PSYCHO SOLDIER TEAM********************************

Athena Asamiya
Fighting Style : Chinese Martial Arts + Psychic powers
Birthdate : 14th March
Nationality : Japan
Blood Group : B+
Height : 163 cm
Weight : 49 kg
Measurements : 83 cm, 57 cm, 82 cm
Likes : Astrology
Fav. Food  : Strawberry cakes
Strong Sports  : Lacross
Impt Things  : Peter Rabbit teacup set
Disliked Things  : Grasshoppers

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Psychic Throw: close, b or f + C
Bit Throw: close, b or f + D
Psychic Shoot: in air and close, b or f or d + C

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Renwa Momo: f + B
Phoenix Bomb: in air, d + D

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Psycho Ball Attack: d, db, b + P
Phoenix Arrow: in air, d, db, b + K
Psycho Reflector: f, df, d, db, b + B
Neo Psycho Reflecter: f, df, d, db, b + D
Psycho Sword: f, d, df + P
Kuuchuu Psycho Sword: in air, f, d, df + P
Psychic Throw: close, b, db, d, df, f + P
Psycho Teleport: d, df, f + K

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Shining Crystal Bit: (f, df, d, db, b)x2 + P (ABCD to cancel)
Kuuchuu Shining Crystal Bit: in air, (f, df, d, db, b)x2 + P (ABCD to cancel) 
Crystal Shoot: either Shining Crystal Bit, d, db, b + P
Phoenix Fang Arrow: (d, df, f)x2 + K

---

Sie Kensou
Fighting Style: Superpowers and Chinese Kung Fu
Birthday: 23rd September
Nationality: China
Blood Type: B
Height: 172 cm
Weight: 61 kg
Fav. Food: Meat buns
Best Sport: Soccer
Impt THings: Stuffed toy given to him by a fan
Disliked Things: Training

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Sunda: close, b or f + C
Tomoe Nage: close, b or f + D

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Kobokushu: f + A
Gousentai: f + B

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Choukyuudan: d, db, b + P
Ryuu Gakusai: b, d, db + K
Ryuu Renga Chiryuu: b, db, d, df, f + A
Ryuu Renga Tenryuu: b, db, d, df, f + C
Ryuu Renda: close, f, d, df + P (C rapidly)
Ryuusoh Geki: in air, d, db, b + P 

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Shinryu SeiohRekkyaku: d, df, f, df, d, db, b + B
Shinryuu Tenbu Kyaku: d, df, f, df, d, db, b + D
Senki Hakkei: close, (d, df, f)x2 + P
Nikkubun: (d, db, b)x2 + P

---

Chin Gentsai
Fighting Style: Chinese Kung Fu (mainly Drunken Fist)
Birthday: 27th April
Nationality: China
Blood Type: A
Height: 164 cm
Weight: 53 kg
Fav. Food: Lemon salmon and lettuce with fried rice, among others
Best Sport: Taking a walk, yo-yo tricks
Impt: Alcohol
Disliked Things: Pandas

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Gou Inshu: close, b or f + C	
Gyaku Ashi Nage: close, b or f + D

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Suiho Hyoutanshuu: f + A

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Hyoutan Geki: d, db, b + A for Jaku, C for Kyou
Ryuurinhourai: f, d, df + P
Kaiten-teki Kuutotsu Ken: b, db, d, df, f + K or
                          BogetsuSui or Suikan Kanou, f + K
Suikan Kanou: d, d + P 
Chou Shuuriku Gyo: Suikan Kanou, f + P
BogetsuSui: d, d + K
RouJu Hanhou: BogetsuSui, u + B
Rigyu Hanhou: BogetsuSui, u + D
Kisuishu: d, df, f + P

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Gouran Enpou: (d, df, f)x2 + P
Gouen Shourai: d, df, f, df, d, db, b + P

********************************WOMEN'S TEAM***********************************

Chizuru Kagura
Fighting Style : Kagura style of ancient martial arts
Birthdate : 26th June
Nationality : Japan
Blood Group : AB
Height : 169 cm
Weight : 52 kg
Likes : Sleeping, motorcycle racing.
Fav. Food  : Spicy foods
Strong Sports : Motorcycle Racing
Impt Things : Pet Java Sparrow, Chee-Chan
Disliked Things  : Unfairness

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Reigetsu: close, b or f + C
Kaiten: close, b or f + D

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Jokatsu Zheng Zheng: f + A
Jokatsu Cang Cang: f + B
Jokatsu Cong Cong: df + B

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

100 Katsu Tenjin no Kotowari: f, d, df + P
212 Katsu Shinsoku no Norito: f, df, d, db, b + A or B or C or D
Tenzui: 212 Katsu Shinsoku no Norito, d, db, b + same button as earlier
108 Katsu Tamayura no Shitsune: d, df, f + P
202 Katsu Otsu Shiki Choumonnoisshin: d, d + A or B or C or D

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Ichimen Ikkatsu Sanrai no Fuijin: d, db, b, db, d, df, f + P
Ichimen 85 Katsu Reigi no Ishizue: (d, df, f)x2 + K

---

Mai Shiranui
Fighting Style : Shiranui-style Ninjitsu
Birthdate : 1st January
Nationality : Japan
Blood Group : B+
Height : 165 cm
Weight : 46 kg
Likes : Making osechi (soup with rice cakes specially for New Year)
Fav. Food  : Ozouni
Strong Sports  : Hane-Tsuki
Impt Things  : Hairpin of deceased grandmother
Disliked Things  : Spiders

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Shiranui Gourin: close, b or f + C
Fuusha Kuzushi: close, b or f + D
Yume-zakura: in air and close, b or f or d + C

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Benitsuru no Mai: df + B
Kuro Tsubame no Mai: f + B
Daiwa Fuusha Otoshi: in air, d + A

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Ka Chou Sen: d, df, f + P
Ryuu En Bu: d, db, b + P
Hisho Ryueijin: f, d, df + K
Hissatsu Shinobi Bachi: b, db, d, df, f + K
Hakura no Mai: f, d, df + P
Musasabi no Mai: d~u + P or in air, d, df, f + P

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Chou Hissatsu Shinobi Bachi: d, db, b, db, d, df, f + K
Houou no Mai: (d, db, b)x2 + P
Kuuchuu Houou no Mai: in air, (d, db, b)x2 + P
Sui Chou no Mai: (d, df, f)x2 + P

100 Shiki Oniyaki Mikansei: f, d, df + P
101 Shiki Oboro Guruma Mikansei: d, db, b + K
Shingo Kinsei Ore Shiki Tsuki Hiji: d, db, b + P 
                                   then f, df, d, db, b + P if critical
Shingo Kinsei Ore Shiki Nietogi: close, f, d, df + K

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Geshiki Kake Hourin: (d, df, f)x2 + P
Burning Shingo: d, db, b, db, d, df, f + P

---

Rugal Bernstein
Fighting Style : A Gesamtkunst composite with mastery of all fighting styles.
Birthdate : February 10th
Nationality : Unknown
Blood Group : Unknown
Height : 197 cm
Weight : 103 kg
Likes : none
Fav. Food  : none
Strong Sports  : All
Impt Things  : Evil Heart
Disliked Things  : Justice

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Scorpion Deathlock: close, b or f + C
Scorpion Blow: close, b or f + D

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Double Tomahawk: f + B

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Reppuken: d, df, f + P
God Press: f, df, d, db, b + P
Dark Barrier: d, df, f + K
Genocide Cutter: f, d, df + K
Kaiser Wave: f, b, db, d, df, f + P (chargeable)

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Gigantic Pressure: d, df, f, df, d, db, b + P
Dead End Screamer: (d, df, f)x2 + K


***********************************LAST BOSS***********************************

Omega Rugal Bernstein (non-playable for now)
Fighting Style : A Gesamtkunst composite with mastery of all fighting styles.
Birthdate : February 10th
Nationality : Unknown
Blood Group : Unknown
Height : 197 cm
Weight : 103 kg
Likes : none
Fav. Food  : none
Strong Sports  : All
Impt Things  : Evil Heart
Disliked Things  : Justice

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Scorpion Deathlock: close, b or f + C
Scorpion Blow: close, b or f + D

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Double Tomahawk: f + A

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Gravity Smash: d, df, f + P
Kuuchuu Gravity Smash: d, df, f + P in air
Banishing Rush: f, df, b, db, b + P
Dark Barrier: d, df, f + K
Dark Genocide: f, d, df + K

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Gigantic Pressure: d, df, f, df, d, db, b + P
Rugal Execution: (d, df, f)x2 + P
Destruction Omega: (d, df, f)x2 + K

Orochi Yashiro

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Baku: close, b or f + C
Beki: close, b or f + D

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Saku: f + A
Bu: f + B

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Kujiku Daichi: d, db, b + P
Odoru Daichi: b, db, d, df, f + K
Niragu Daichi: close, b, db, d, df, f + P
Musebu Daichi: close, f, df, d, db, b, f + P

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Araburu Daichi: (d, df, f)x2 + K
Ankoku Jigoku Gokuraku Otoshi: (f, df, d, db, b)x2 + P
Hoeru Daichi: (d, df, f)x2 + P

                      o----------------------o

                      o----------------------o

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Kourai: f + B

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Yatanagi no Muchi: d, db, b + P
Shajitsu no Odori: d, db, b + K
Mugetsu no Raiun: b, db, d, df, f + A or B or C or D
Raijin no Tsue: in air, d, df, f + K

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Ankokou Raikoken: (d, df, f)x2 + P
Shukumei Genei Shinshi: (d, df, f)x2 + K

                      o----------------------o

Jukei no Oni: f + B
Setsudan no Koto: df + B

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Taiyou wo Iru Honoo: d, df, f + P
Kagami wo Hofuru Honoo: d, db, b + P
Tsuki wo Tsumu Honoo: f, d, df + P
Shishi wo Kamu Honoo: close, b, db, d, df, f + K

                      o----------------------o

                      o----------------------o

95' Kyo Kusanagi

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Hachi Tetsu: close, b or f + C
Issetsu Seoi Nage: close, b or f + D


                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Ge Shiki: Goufu You: f + D
Ge Shiki: Naraku Otoshi: in air, d + C
88 Shiki: df + D

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

108 Shiki Yami Barai: d, df, f + P
100 Shiki Oniyaki: f, d, df + P
101 Shiki Oboro Kuruma: b, d, db + K
202 Shiki Kototsuki You: f, df, d, db, b + K
75 Shiki Kai: d, df, f + B,B or D, D

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Ura 108 Shiki Orochinagi: d, db, b, db, d, df, f + P (delayable)

---

EX Terry Bogard

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Grasping Upper: close, b or f + C
Buster Throw: close, b or f + D

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Back Knuckle: f + A
Rising Upper: df + C

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Power Wave: d, df, f + P
Burn Knuckle: d, db, b + P
Crack Shoot: d, db, b + K
Rising Tackle: d~u + P
Fire Kick: b, db, d, df, f + K

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Power Geyser: d, db, b, db, f + P

---

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Gourin Kai: close, b or f + C
Kakaekomi Nage: close, b or f + D

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Jou Agito: f + B
Age Omote: df + A

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Zaneiken:db,f + P
Gadankou: Zaneiken, d, df, f+P
Hishouken: d, db, b + P
Shouryuudan: f, d, df + P
Kuuhadan: b, db, d, df, f + K
Geki Kabehaisui Sho: d, db, b + P (up to 4 times)

                      o----------------------o

                      o----------------------o

Choureppadan: d, db, b, db, d, df, f+K
Otokochidan: (d, df, f)x2 + P

---

EX Joe Higashi

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Hiza Jigoku: close, b or f + C
Leg Throw: close, b or f + D

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Low Kick: f + B
Sliding: df + B

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Hurricane Upper: b, db, d, df, f + P
Bakuretsu: P rapidly
Finish: Bakuretsu, d, df, f + P
Tiger Kick: f, d, df + K
Slash Kick: b, db, d, df, f + K

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Screw Upper: (d, df, f)x2 + P
Thunder Fire: (d, df, f)x2 + K

EX Mai Shiranui

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Shiranui Gourin: close, b or f + C
Fuusha Kuzushi: close, b or f + D
Yume-zakura: in air and close, b or f or d + C

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Benitsuru no Mai: df + B
Kuro Tsubame no Mai: f + B
Daiwa Fuusha Otoshi: in air, d + A

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Ka Chou Sen: d, df, f + P
Ryuu En Bu: d, db, b + P
Hissatsu Shinobi Bachi: b, db, d, df, f + K
Musasabi no Mai: d~u + P or in air, d, df, f + P
Sayochidori: d, db, b + K

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Chou Hissatsu Shinobi Bachi: d, db, b, db, d, df, f + K
Hanaarashi: (d, df, f)x2 + P

---

EX Billy Kane

                      o----------------------o
                                THROWS
                      o----------------------o

Jigoku Otoshi: close, b or f + C
Ippon Zuri Nage: close, b or f + D

                      o----------------------o
                            COMMAND MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Dai Kaiten Geri: f + A
Boutaka Tobigeri: f + B

                      o----------------------o
                            SPECIAL MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Sansetsu Kon Chuudan Uchi: b, db, d, df, f + P
Kaen: Sansetsu Kon Chuudan Uchi, d, df, f + P
Senpuu Kon: A repeatedly
Shuutenren Hakon: C repeatedly
Kyoushuu Hishou Kon: f, d, df + K
Karyuu Tsuigeki Kon: d, db, b + B
Suzume Otoshi: d, db, b + P

                      o----------------------o
                            SUPER MOVES
                      o----------------------o

Chou Kaen Senpuu Kon: d, df, f, df, d, db, b + P
Salamander Storm: (d, df, f)x2 + P
Kuren Satsu Kon: (d, df, f)x2 + K
